About Us

PTS Painting Ltd. Is locally owned and operated company. Established 2010 in Saskatoon,Sk with over 40 years of Painting experience we bring precision, professionalism and customer satisfaction!We begin the process with careful inspection and good plan of the project before we get started. With honest estimates and friendly employees look no further for your painting needs.We love our job that is why we put in extra passion and love behind what we do,so your expectations are met or exceeded.
